TestCase.name: testAvoidAggregatePushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, count(a), sum(c), sum(d) FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT b, a, sum(c) c, sum(d) d FROM T1 GROUP BY a, b ) AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.age > 10 ) AS T GROUP BY b

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], a=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($6, 10)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c=[SUM($2)], d=[SUM($3)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, T1]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS EXPR$2, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_COUNT(a) AS count$0, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$1, Partial_SUM(d) AS sum$2]) +- Calc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- JoinTable(join=[b, a, c, d, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[1-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[>(age, 10)], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- Calc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS c, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$0, Partial_SUM(d) AS sum$1]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testJoinStaticTable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T.a, T.b, D.name FROM MyTable AS T JOIN dimStatic AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], name=[$4]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimStatic]])

Calc(select=[a, b, name]) +- JoinTable(join=[a, b, id, name], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin]) +- Calc(select=[a, b]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$3], name=[$4], age=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

JoinTable(join=[a, b, c, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id AND D.age = 10 WHERE T.c > 1000

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$3], name=[$4], age=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 1000)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($5, 10))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

Calc(select=[a, b, c, id, name, CAST(10) AS age]) +- JoinTable(join=[a, b, c, id, name], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(age, 10)], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(c, 1000)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithNestedQuery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a, b FROM MyTable WHERE c > 1000) AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], id=[$2], name=[$3], age=[$4]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 1000)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

JoinTable(join=[a, b, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[>(c, 1000)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinTemporalTable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable AS T LEFT JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$3], name=[$4], age=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

JoinTable(join=[a, b, c, id, name, age], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testJoinTemporalTableWithProjectionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T.*, D.id FROM MyTable AS T JOIN dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

JoinTable(join=[a, b, c, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[0-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLogicalPlanWithImplicitTypeCast
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.b = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$3], name=[$4], age=[$5]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], id=[$4], name=[$5], age=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], b0=[CAST($1):INTEGER]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, id, name, age]) +- FlinkLogicalJoinTable(dimTable=[TestDimensionTable], on=[[3-0]], joinType=[inner]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, CAST(b) AS b0]) +- FlinkLogicalNativeTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testLogicalPlan
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, count(a), sum(c), sum(d) FROM ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT b, a, sum(c) c, sum(d) d FROM T1 GROUP BY a, b ) AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.age > 10 ) AS T GROUP BY b

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], a=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($6, 10)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c=[SUM($2)], d=[SUM($3)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, T1]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)], EXPR$3=[SUM($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- FlinkLogicalJoinTable(dimTable=[TestDimensionTable], on=[[1-0]], joinType=[inner], dimProject=[id], dimFilter=[>(age, 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, a, c, d]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c=[SUM($2)], d=[SUM($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalNativeTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_1]])

TestCase.name: testReusing
TestCase.Resource: SELECT count(T1.a), count(T1.id), sum(T2.a) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b, a, sum(c) c, sum(d) d FROM T1 GROUP BY a, b ) AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.age > 10 ) AS T1, ( SELECT id as a, b FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b, a, sum(c) c, sum(d) d FROM T1 GROUP BY a, b ) AS T JOIN LATERAL dimTemporal FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF PROCTIME() AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.age > 10 ) AS T ) AS T2 WHERE T1.a = T2.a GROUP BY T1.b, T2.b

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$2], EXPR$1=[$3], EXPR$2=[$4]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($2)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($3)], EXPR$2=[SUM($4)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], b0=[$8], a=[$1], id=[$4], a0=[$7]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $7)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(b=[$0], a=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], id=[$4], name=[$5], age=[$6]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($6, 10)]) : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3]) : : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c=[SUM($2)], d=[SUM($3)]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, T1]]) : +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$4], b=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], a=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], id=[$4], name=[$5], age=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($6, 10)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c=[SUM($2)], d=[SUM($3)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, T1]]) +- LogicalTemporalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, dimTemporal]], period=[PROCTIME()])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[b, b0], select=[b, b0, Final_$SUM0(sum0$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_$SUM0(sum0$1) AS EXPR$1, Final_SUM(sum$2) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, b0]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b, b0], select=[b, b0, Partial_$SUM0($f8) AS sum0$0, Partial_$SUM0($f9) AS sum0$1, Partial_SUM(EXPR$2) AS sum$2]) +- Calc(select=[b, a, $f2, $f3, a0, b0, $f20, EXPR$2, *($f2, $f20) AS $f8, *($f3, $f20) AS $f9]) +- HashJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[b, a, $f2, $f3, a0, b0, $f20, EXPR$2], joinType=[InnerJoin], isBroadcast=[true], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[b, a, CAST(CASE(IS NOT NULL(a), 1, 0)) AS $f2, CAST(CASE(IS NOT NULL(id), 1, 0)) AS $f3]) : +- JoinTable(join=[b, a, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[1-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[>(age, 10)], period=[PROCTIME()]) : +- Calc(select=[b, a], reuse_id=[1]) : +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS c, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS d]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$0, Partial_SUM(d) AS sum$1]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_db, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS $f2, Final_SUM(sum$1) AS EXPR$2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(*) AS count$0, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$1]) +- Calc(select=[id AS a, b]) +- JoinTable(join=[b, a, id], source=[TestDimensionTable(id, name, age)], on=[[1-0]], joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[>(age, 10)], period=[PROCTIME()]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
